title: 4 OFFICE AUTOMATION

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with 4 OFFICE AUTOMATION. The average
  contract duration was 2.75 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $41.1K.
  The longest contract was 7.21 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $1.9M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.2M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '212'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '89'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '42%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '62%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2.22'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '-1.6M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '2.75'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '41.1K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '7.21'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '1.9M'
